name: Sea Pearl Beach Resort & Spa Cox's Bazar
description: Indulge in the comfort of our Deluxe Rooms, featuring modern amenities and stunning views of the surrounding mountains. Each room is elegantly furnished to ensure a relaxing stay.

name: Grand Sylhet Hotel & Resort
description: Experience unparalleled luxury in our Executive Suites, offering spacious living areas, a private balcony, and personalized concierge service. Perfect for those seeking a truly indulgent getaway.

name: Lakeshore Banani
description: Experience luxury and comfort at Grand View Hotel, where hospitality meets breathtaking views. Nestled in the heart of Nature Valley, our hotel offers a serene retreat for those seeking relaxation and adventure alike.

name: Ocean Paradise Hotel & Resort
description: Escape to Oceanfront Paradise Resort, where the soothing sound of waves meets luxurious accommodations. Located on the pristine beaches of Azure Bay, our resort offers a perfect blend of relaxation and seaside adventure.

name: Hotel Tropical Daisy
description: Upgrade to a Mountain Suite for extra space and a private balcony with panoramic views of the majestic peaks.

name: Hotel Noorjahan Grand
description: Our comfortable Standard Rooms are perfect for those seeking a quiet retreat after a day of exploring the surrounding hiking trails.

name: Ascott Palace Dhaka
description: Discover serenity in the heart of the mountains at Mountain Retreat Lodge. Surrounded by lush forests and stunning peaks, our lodge provides a cozy and peaceful escape for nature enthusiasts.
